name: The Big Nom - Ludum Dare 40
description:
Gameplay video:

You incarnate a greedy princess that wants to eat every cakes in her light of sight. The problem is that the more she eats, the heaviest she gets and becomes unable to jump and go on tiny spaces.

Will you be able to find the giant cake?

LD Jam page (don't forget to rate and comment it!): https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/chubby-princess

TEAM

3D graphics and level design: Danyl Bekhoucha (Linko) (https://ldjam.com/users/danyl/)

Programmer: Angelos Kyriakopoulos (https://ldjam.com/users/angelkyriako)

Programmer: Programmer: Max (Pixel Lifetime) (https://ldjam.com/users/pixel-lifetime)

Music and sounds: Aurélien Montéro (https://ldjam.com/users/aurelien-montero/)

SOFTWARE USED

Game Engine: Unity

Modeling software: Blender

Collaboration: GitHub

Game is being rebuilt, meanwhile you can play at an older version online here: https://linko-3d.github.io/LD40/
